personalDetails.headline: Hi,
personalDetails.paragraph1: I'm Christian Gerbig. I'm a Web Developer focused on Frontend and Backend technologies. My homebase is Hamburg in Germany.
personalDetails.paragraph2: I believe in the positive power of communication with a trust in cooperative team working making an asset from sharing different points of views.
personalDetails.paragraph3: I like to use every aspect of new technology available to reach the goals and love to code optimized solutions suiting individual requirements with respect to time, budget and target.
personalDetails.paragraph4: My motto: Learning things, improving (them) and reach the goals.

experience.headline: How it began
experience.paragraph1: I started to learn the fundamentals of Web Development by myself and as a Full Stack Web Developper at Ironhack.
experience.paragraph2: I improved my skills to write Clean Code and learned in several Udemy courses to apply the Redux Toolkit and TypeScript together with React in my projects.
experience.paragraph3: Meanwhile I dived more into agile work as a trainee developer and learned to use Vue together with Vuex and wrote end-2-end tests for Cypress.
experience.paragraph4: I would like to become part of a team where I can apply, develop and share my skills.
